caption:
This wasn't technically taken today but it didn't look like this until I stacked all of the images in photoshop in the early ours of this morning so I think it still counts.

This is about 20, 4 second, 400 ISO exposures layered with the 'maximum' smart object stacking mode to bring out the cars moving on the road.

I did make up a different version that kept the stars steady but I think the trails are actually nicer. This is the first photo I've taken that's captured the earth spinning which is quite cool.
.
.
.
